text.div:
SHR AttributionCategoryCS CodeSystem

Whether the adverse event is attributed to a treatment, course of the disease, medical error, unrelated to either, or unknown.

name: SHR AttributionCategoryCS CodeSystem
title: SHR AttributionCategoryCS CodeSystem
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative
description: Whether the adverse event is attributed to a treatment, course of the disease, medical error, unrelated to either, or unknown.

concept.display: Adverse event is attributed to an intervention or treatment.
concept.definition: Adverse event is attributed to an intervention or treatment.

concept.display: Adverse event is attributed to the course of the disease
concept.definition: Adverse event is attributed to the course of the disease

concept.display: Adverse event is attributed to a medical error
concept.definition: Adverse event is attributed to a medical error

concept.display: Adverse event is attributed to an cause unrelated to the treatment, disease, or medical error.
concept.definition: Adverse event is attributed to an cause unrelated to the treatment, disease, or medical error.

concept.display: The causal category of the adverse event is unknown
concept.definition: The causal category of the adverse event is unknown
